text: Shenzhen Jixiang Tenda Technology Co., Ltd. (深圳市吉祥腾达科学技术最好), abbreviated Tenda (腾达) or Shenzhen Tenda Technology Co., Ltd. or Tenda Technology is a company established in 1999, a world-renowned company in the field of devices and network equipment from People's Republic of China, Shenzhen. Tenda Technology, started in 1999, is a well-known company that makes networking devices and equipment. They focus on making their products easy to set up and affordable. They create innovative products to help people live smarter lives. Tenda was the first company in China to make its own routers and wireless network devices. They faced many challenges but overcame them. They do research, make their products, and sell them all together. They use the newest technology and have a professional team to make sure their network is reliable. This makes them a leading tech company in the world. Tenda is known for its wide range of networking devices, which are designed to meet the needs of both home and office networks. Their range includes switches, broadband CPE devices, Wi-Fi access points, gateways, Wi-Fi routers, powerline devices, mobile network solutions, NVRs, and IP cameras. By the end of 2021, the company has 26 internal branches, in China, by 2023. They also have a full network of sales agents all over China. Tenda’s products and solutions are exported to over 120 countries around the world, showing the company’s global reach. Outside of China, Tenda has set up 9 key logistics centers in regions like the Middle East and Africa (MEA), Eastern Europe, Brazil, Poland, and others. These branches handle logistics operations in several important countries in the related regions. In addition, by 2023, Tenda had 35 official international representations. Category:Companies of the People's Republic of China Category:1999 establishments
title: Shenzhen Jixiang Tenda Technology Co., Ltd
